titles: The blacke devil or the apostate Together with the wolfe worrying the lambes. And the spiritual navigator, bound for the Holy Land. In three sermons. By Thomas Adams.
author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
notes: "Lycanthropy, or the vvolfe vvorrying the lambes" and "The spirituall nauigator bound for the Holy Land" each has separatley dated title page, pagination and register.
Initial leaf contains large signature-mark "A" with ornaments.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
